An Angry bear is a monster that appears during A Soul's Bane quest, or afterwards, in Tolna's rift.

During the quest, it can only be killed with the anger spear. After the quest, it can be fought with any weapon. Angry bears will count towards a bears Slayer assignment.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Requirements Spawns Map
Tolna's rift35, 40None2Maplink

Graphical updates[edit | edit source]

  • Angry bear after 3 April 2006 (update)

  • Angry bear after 22 January 2024 (update)

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 22 January 2024 (Update):
    • Updated the Angry Unicorn, Bear and Giant Rat in Tolna's Rift to use newer models.
  • patch 28 January 2013 (Update):
    • Angry bears have had their attack and defend animations restored.
  • update 3 April 2006 (Update):
    • Added to game.
